<script>
// ROI Calculator Script
window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    function calculateROI() {
        const tendersPerYear = parseFloat(document.getElementById('tenders-per-year').value) || 20;
        const currentWinRate = parseFloat(document.getElementById('current-win-rate').value) || 10;
        const avgContractValue = parseFloat(document.getElementById('avg-contract-value').value) || 5000000;
        const avgMargin = parseFloat(document.getElementById('avg-margin').value) || 8;
        
        // Calculate current and improved metrics
        const currentWins = tendersPerYear * (currentWinRate / 100);
        const improvedWinRate = 35; // Target win rate
        const improvedWins = tendersPerYear * (improvedWinRate / 100);
        const additionalWins = Math.round(improvedWins - currentWins);
        
        // Calculate financial impact
        const profitPerContract = avgContractValue * (avgMargin / 100);
        const additionalProfit = additionalWins * profitPerContract;
        
        // Calculate ROI (assuming 3% service fee)
        const serviceFee = additionalWins * avgContractValue * 0.03;
        const roi = serviceFee > 0 ? Math.round((additionalProfit / serviceFee) * 100) : 0;
        
        // Update display
        document.querySelector('[data-metric="new-win-rate"]').textContent = improvedWinRate + '%';
        document.querySelector('[data-metric="additional-wins"]').textContent = '+' + additionalWins;
        document.querySelector('[data-metric="additional-profit"]').textContent = '+' + additionalProfit.toLocaleString('pl-PL') + ' PLN';
        document.querySelector('[data-metric="roi"]').textContent = roi + '%';
    }
    
    // Add event listeners to inputs
    const inputs = ['tenders-per-year', 'current-win-rate', 'avg-contract-value', 'avg-margin'];
    inputs.forEach(id => {
        const element = document.getElementById(id);
        if (element) {
            element.addEventListener('input', calculateROI);
        }
    });
    
    // Initial calculation
    calculateROI();
});
</script>
